channel.title: Regular Mission Items/Themes Bonus
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Regular Mission Items/Themes Bonus" - Doujutsu is not a Regular mission ?

item.title: Re: Regular Mission Items/Themes Bonus
item.content:encoded:
Regular missions are actually a remnant from ye olde BvS, where Quests were actually called Special Missions, and not, well, quests.
Anything you access from the mission submenu should get those item bonuses, though.

item.title: Regular Mission Items/Themes Bonus
item.content:encoded:
just curios about Regular Mission (G/N/T) vs Burger/Pizzawitch (D).

if D stat is not a Regular Mission better if there is any info about this in that items bonus.
